pos_mean_info_list.mean: 配对；摞合；[机] 双层轧制

和...一起结对；与...配对；与...结对

word_group.phrase: show a clean pair of heels
show someone a clean pair of heels

bilingual.source: Present your ideas to another pair of students.
bilingual.target: 向另一对学生展示你的想法。

bilingual.source: Who has a pair of ears more famous than Mickey's?
bilingual.target: 谁有一对比米老鼠更著名的耳朵？

bilingual.source: You go to the store to buy another pair of earrings that looks similar to the missing pair.
bilingual.target: 你去商店买另一对看起来和丢失的耳环相似的耳环。

bilingual.source: If “hard” is the opposite of “soft”, why are “hardly” and “softly” not an opposing pair?
bilingual.target: 如果“硬”是“软”的反义词，为什么“几乎不”和“轻轻地”不是一对反义词？

bilingual.source: They are a pair of good friends.
We need a new pair of quants.
bilingual.target: 我们需要一对新的船桨。

bilingual.source: I have a pair of twins brothers.
I bought a pair of shoes yesterday.

list.abstract: Pair是一款适用于生意之间的手机应用程序。

yingyinNormal.en: What was the threat? Clementine. I perceived her to be moving toward a pair of guests with harmful intent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 威胁是什么？克莱门汀，我认为她企图伤害一对游客。

yingyinNormal.en: Here's some other fun news on the Raj/Emily front. He gave her a pair of diamond earrings and leased her a car.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我来爆点杰丽恋的料吧，他送了她一对钻石耳环，还给她租了一辆车。

yingyinNormal.en: I have to pair it with you. Pair what with me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我得把它跟你配对。把什么跟我配对？

yingyinNormal.en: No, actually, an au pair. Technically, I played an au pair on TV. There's a difference. A lot of people don't know that. I was an au pair.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，实际上是换工住宿生，准确的说，我在电视上演的是个换工住宿生。这两者是有区别的，很多人都不知道，我饰演的是一个换工住宿生。

yingyinNormal.en: Words to live by, Eggsy. Words to live by. Try a pair.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一生铭记，艾格西，这话要一生铭记着。试试这双。

yingyinNormal.en: You're going to need a pair of shoes to go with your suit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你需要双鞋子来搭配西装。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, yes, please. A pair of pants. And my toothbrush. Yeah, and my mail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拜托你了，带条裤子，我的牙刷，我的信。

yingyinNormal.en: I know who you are, boy. Because you're me. What kind of a pair are we.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为你跟我一样。咱俩算什么组合啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Poor Peppa. Your shoes were getting a bit old, we'll buy you a new pair!
yingyinNormal.zh: 可怜的佩佩。你的鞋也有一点旧了，我们给你买一双新的！

yingyinNormal.en: I bet if I think about it real hard I could remember my first pair of shoes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我仔细想的话，我能记得我第一双鞋子的模样。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, come on, grow a pair, Bob. We're giving you what you want. Give us what we want.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拜托，有点胆子，鲍勃。我们都随你的心了，也满足我们一下嘛。

yingyinNormal.en: Echolocation. Oh, like the world's most powerful pair of glasses? What? What are glasses?
yingyinNormal.zh: 传声定位。像是史上最强眼镜吗？什么？什么是眼镜？

yingyinNormal.en: And this color is just stunning. It's a peachy nude color perfect to pair with smoky eyes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个颜色看起来好极了。是桃色，与灰色的眼睛很搭配。

yingyinNormal.en: You can't make crotchless panties? You take, you take a pair of scissors and you just cut…
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不会做开洞的内裤？拿一把剪刀给它剪…

yingyinNormal.en: Really? 'Cause this morning at Starbucks, a pair of old underwear fell out of my pant leg.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是吗？今天早上在星巴克一条脏内裤从我裤管里掉了出来。

yingyinNormal.en: When I was little, my mum got me a pair of glittery wellies, and I refused to take them off.
yingyinNormal.zh: 小时候我妈给我买过一双亮闪闪的雨鞋，我都不愿意把它们脱下来。

yingyinNormal.en: And I thought to myself: Wow, you know, I never owned a really good-smelling pair of pants before.
yingyinNormal.zh: 于是我心想，我从来没买过一条很香的皮裤。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, you leave Marcel out of this. Fine. Have you ever got stuck in a pair of your own leather pants?
yingyinNormal.zh: 别把马修扯进来。好吧，你曾经被自己的皮裤卡住了？

yingyinNormal.en: Honey, isn't it possible that the company that sold the jeans made more than just the one pair? I guess.
yingyinNormal.zh: 卖出那件牛仔裤的公司难道只做了一条牛仔裤吗？我猜你说的对。

yingyinNormal.en: Now I haven't got any shoes to wear. Poor Peppa. Your shoes were getting a bit old, we'll buy you a new pair.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在我没有鞋子可穿了。可怜的佩琪，你的鞋子确实有点旧了，买双新的吧。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 一对; 一双; 一副

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 修理；修补；去；赴；修复；恢复；使重归于好

word_family.mean: n. 一双；一对；一副；一把；一条；对子；俩人；另一只；另一人；交配的一对

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 和...一起结对；与...配对；与...结对

sense_info_list.zh: 一对; 一双; 一副

examination_example.sentence: The Supreme Court's opinion Thursday overruled a <highlight>pair</highlight> of decades-old decisions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最高法院周四的意见推翻了两项已有数十年历史的判决。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Pairs</highlight> of opponents hit the ball back and forth until one winner emerges from all who entered.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 成对的对手来回击球，直到所有参赛者中出现一名胜利者。

examination_example.sentence: Radesky has studied the use of mobile phones and tablets at mealtimes by giving mother – child <highlight>pairs</highlight> a food-testing exercise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 雷德斯基研究了手机和平板电脑在用餐时的使用情况，方法是让母子进行食物测试练习。

examination_example.sentence: In contrast, only five of the 30 children <highlight>paired</highlight> with the "unreliable" tester participated in a follow-up activity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相比之下，与“不可靠”测试员配对的30名儿童中只有5名参与了后续活动。

examination_example.sentence: It's like the teacher who breaks up the troublemakers in the back row by <highlight>pairing</highlight> them with better-behaved classmates.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就像老师会把教室后排爱惹麻烦的学生分开，将他们和表现更好的学生安排在一起一样。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>pair</highlight> of entrepreneurs are planning to build and launch a spacecraft that would carry and roast coffee beans in outer space.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一对企业家正计划建造和发射一个可以在外太空携带和烘焙咖啡豆的航天器。

examination_example.sentence: This is where the <highlight>pair</highlight>'s company is based.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是两人公司的所在地。

examination_example.sentence: What are a <highlight>pair</highlight> of entrepreneurs planning to do?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一对创业者打算做什么？

sense_info_list.en: two things that match or are meant to be used together

word_usage.usage: “a pair of+名词”作主语时，谓语动词一般用单数。如：There is a new pair of shoes under the bed.床下有一双新鞋。

direction_info.description:

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: At the beginning of the year, the artist built a piece called "Strawpocalypse", a <highlight>pair</highlight> of 10-foot-tall plastic waves, frozen mid-crash.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 年初，这位艺术家制作了一件名为“吸管末日”（Strawpocalypse）的作品，这是一对10英尺高的塑料波，在撞击过程中冻结。

examination_example.sentence: How about a <highlight>pair</highlight> of running shoes?
You have to rely on your experience and on the feel of each <highlight>pair</highlight> as you shop.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以你买鞋时必须依靠自己的经验和每双鞋的脚感。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>pair</highlight> went down the stairs quietly to the kitchen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两人悄悄地下了楼梯，来到厨房。

word_usage.usage: “a pair of+名词”作主语时，谓语动词一般用单数。如：There is a new pair of shoes under the bed.床下有一双新鞋。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 修理；修补；去；赴；修复；恢复；使重归于好

word_family.mean: n. 一双；一对；一副；一把；一条；对子；俩人；另一只；另一人；交配的一对

examination_example.sentence: I need a <highlight>pair</highlight> of black shoes for a basketball game.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我需要一双黑色的篮球鞋。

examination_example.sentence: It may be a <highlight>pair</highlight> of sports shoes.
A <highlight>pair</highlight> of sports shoes was found on the school bus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在校车上发现了一双运动鞋。

word_usage.usage:
当“a pair of…”结构作主语时，谓语动词要用单数形式；当“...pairs of...”结构作主语时，谓语动词要用复数形式，即谓语动词要和pair的形式保持一致。
如：There is a pair of shoes under the bed.
床下面有一双鞋。
There are five pairs of shoes under the bed.
床下面有五双鞋。
